home.title: EZMarket
home.content: We call it Easy Marketplace . The first digital marketplace based on blockchain technology. We want to create a marketplace where you can buy or sell all assets for project development (code scripts, templates, plugins, photos,...) on the easiest way. Payment will very fast, simple and safe with cryptocurrency

countdown.title: EZM Token sale start on Saturday, October 14, 2017 10:00:00 AM (GMT)

subscribe.title: Subscribe for News, Updates and Exclusive Offers!
subscribe.thanks: Thank you! We need to confirm your email address. To complete the subscription process, please click the link in the email we just sent you.

presale.title: Token Presale
presale.desc: Participation in EZMarket token presale gives you the unique opportunity to buy a large number of tokens individually and with no waiting period. Please, read the terms below before decide to participate in EZMarket token presale
presale.terms: During the presale period, the token will be priced at 1 ETH = 1500 EZM. There are no refunds or cancellations and you cannot transfer your tokens until the ICO is over. You have to send ETH funds from your personal Ethereum wallets that you own the private keys (like MyEtherWallet, Metamask, Parity, Mist or Ledger). DO NOT send funds from exchanges (Bittrex, Poloniex,...). We are not responsible for any such losses
presale.acceptment: I have read and agree to the terms of the EZM Token Pre-sale.

crowdsale.title: Token Sale is now live !
crowdsale.address: Please send ETH to below address
crowdsale.note1: You have to send ETH funds from your personal Ethereum wallets that you own the private keys (like MyEtherWallet, Metamask, Parity, Mist or Ledger)
crowdsale.note2: DO NOT send funds from exchanges like Bittrex, Poloniex etc
crowdsale.note3: Set Gas Limit to 250 000 (during high-load network)

buysell.title: Everything comes to the easiest with EZMarket
buysell.upload: You want to sell? Upload your assets. No bank, no credit card, no personal information require. Almost you just need a cryptocurrency address
buysell.payment: You want to buy? Buy everything you need with few click. Send coin and you get assets
buysell.goal: Our goal is create a conveniently and easily marketplace for user

token_holder.title: TOKEN HOLDER
token_holder.desc: Company will take fees on sold assets. This revenue will be shared to all token holders. EZM token also can trade on some exchanges (HitBTC, EtherDelta, Cryptopia)

roadmap.title: ROADMAP
roadmap.q1_2017: Technical Research: Blockchain technology, Ethereum smart contract
roadmap.q3_2017: ICO: Build ICO site, Create smart contract for token sale, Presale, Crowdsale
roadmap.q4_2017: Development phase 1: Build core framework, Design database, APIs
roadmap.q1_2018: Development phase 2: Focus on main functions for author: account management, content management, publish item to sell
roadmap.q2_2018: Development phase 3: Focus on main functions for buyer: account management, preview item, buy item
